sense.def:
Recognition
je to, da nekoga ali nekaj prepoznamo.

seg.quote: She walked past me without so much as a glance of recognition.

sense.def:
Recognition of something
pomeni, da se ljudje nečesa zavedo ali da sprejmejo, da tisto obstaja ali da je res.

seg.quote: There has been insufficient recognition of the magnitude of the problem.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj narejeno
in recognition of someone's achievements
, je narejeno zato, da uradno pokažemo spoštovanje do določenega človeka.

seg.quote: He was awarded a knighthood in recognition of his great contribution to the British cinema.
